name: Cure for the woods [Global Game Jam 2023]
name_original: Cure for the woods [Global Game Jam 2023]
description: This game is an classic old school point&click-adventure. The player takes the role of a forest spirit who gets asked for help by a troubled tree who suffers from a terrible pain originating from it's roots. The player then dives into an adventure to find the origins of this disease, that seems to spread though the woods. They will explore a world full of fantastic places inhabited by weird creatures and characters, some of them friendly but other... not so much.
